tit.e: Giving the title of Imperial Prince by an imperial order
Giving the title of Imperial Prince
tit.cmt: 用語集の通りにしました。
tit.e: Giving the title of Imperial Prince

sen.j: 親王宣下（しんのうせんげ）とは皇族の子女に親王、内親王の資格を与えることである。
sen.e: Giving the title of Imperial Prince by an imperial order is to give the titles of Imperial Prince or Imperial Princessto the children of the Imperial family.
Giving the title of Imperial Prince is to give the title of Imperial Prince or Imperial Princess to the children of the Imperial family.
sen.cmt: 親王宣下の訳を親王宣下に揃えました。余分な改行を削除しました。文法を修正しました。
sen.e: Giving the title of Imperial Prince is to give the title of Imperial Prince or Imperial Princess to the children of the Imperial family.

sen.j: ここでは、主に日本の皇室について記載する。
sen.e: In this article, the situation in the Japanese Imperial Family will mainly mentioned.

sen.j: 明治時代以前には、たとえ天皇の子供であっても親王宣下を受けない限り親王を名乗る事は出来なかった（参考：以仁王）。
sen.e: Before the Meiji period, even a child of Emperor was not entitled to wear the title of Imperial Prince unless he was given the title of Imperial Prince by an imperial order (Reference : Mochihito-o).
Before the Meiji period, even a child of Emperor was not entitled to use the title of Imperial Prince unless he was given the title of Imperial Prince (Reference : Mochihito-o).
sen.cmt: 親王宣下の訳を用語集に揃えました。単語を修正しました。
sen.e: Before the Meiji period, even a child of Emperor was not entitled to use the title of Imperial Prince unless he was given the title of Imperial Prince (Reference : Mochihito-o).

sen.j: 逆に世襲親王家の当主などの天皇の孫以下の世代に相当する皇族であっても、親王宣下を受けて親王となることもあった。
sen.e: Conversely, even such a member of the Imperial family as the head of a hereditary family of prince who was in generations after grandchildren of Emperor sometimes became an Imperial Prince by an imperial order.

Conversely, even such members of the Imperial family as the head of a hereditary family of prince, who were in the generations same as or after the grandchildren of Emperor, sometimes became an Imperial Prince by an imperial order.

Conversely, even such members of the Imperial family as the head of a hereditary family of prince, who were in the generations same as or after the grandchildren of Emperor, sometimes became an Imperial Prince by an imperial order.

sen.j: 現代では皇室典範により嫡出の皇子及び嫡男系嫡出の皇孫が親王及び内親王であると定められている。
sen.e: Today, as stipulated in the Imperial Household Law, legitimate children of Emperor and legitimate children of the legitimate sons of Emperor are to be Imperial Prince or Imperial Princess.
Today, as stipulated in the Imperial House Law, legitimate children of Emperor and legitimate children of the legitimate sons of Emperor are to be an Imperial Prince or an Imperial Princess.
sen.cmt: 皇室典範を用語集に揃えました。文法を修正しました。
sen.e: Today, as stipulated in the Imperial House Law, legitimate children of Emperor and legitimate children of the legitimate sons of Emperor are to be an Imperial Prince or an Imperial Princess.

sen.j: したがって、皇族は生まれながらにして地位が決まっているため、親王宣下という形で王 (皇族)などの皇族に親王位を与える制度は無くなっている。
sen.e: Therefore, since the members of the Imperial family are born with their rights for titles, the system of giving the title of Imperial Prince to such members of the Imperial family as O (Imperial family) was abolished.

Therefore, since the members of the Imperial family are born with the right for the titles, the system of giving the title of Imperial Prince to the members of the Imperial family like king (Imperial family) was abolished.
sen.cmt: 「王」はkingとしました。文法を修正しました。
sen.e: Therefore, since the members of the Imperial family are born with the right for the titles, the system of giving the title of Imperial Prince to the members of the Imperial family like king (Imperial family) was abolished.

sen.j: ただし、王が天皇に即位した場合、その天皇の兄弟姉妹たる王及び女王に親王及び内親王の地位を与えるものとすることが皇室典範第7条に定められている。
sen.e: However, it is stipulated in the Article 7 of the Imperial Household Law that if an O ascends the throne, O and Jo-o who are brothers and sisters of the Emperor shall be given the titles of Imperial Prince or Imperial Princess.

However, it is stipulated in the Article 7 of the Imperial House Law that if a king ascends the Imperial throne, kings and princesses who are brothers and sisters of the Emperor shall be given the titles of Imperial Prince or Imperial Princess.
sen.cmt: 「天皇に即位」を Imperial throneとしました。「王」Kingに相当する「女王」はQueenですが、この文脈ではprincessが適当だと思われます。
sen.e: However, it is stipulated in the Article 7 of the Imperial House Law that if a king ascends the Imperial throne, kings and princesses who are brothers and sisters of the Emperor shall be given the titles of Imperial Prince or Imperial Princess.
